Type.Name: IChannelSender

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelSender implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: The sending side of channels must expose the interface.

summary.para: Provides required functions and properties for the sender channels.
